title: Fahad Al-Zahrani
text:
Fahad Al-Zahrani (born 2 February 1979) is a <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a>. At the club level, he currently plays for <a href="Al%20Nassr%20FC">Al-Nassr</a> in <a href="Saudi%20Arabia">Saudi Arabia</a>.
Al-Zahrani joined Al-Nasr at the summer of 2007 on a one-year loan from <a href="Al-Ahli%20%28Jeddah%29">Al-Ahli</a>. In 2008, he moved permanently to Al-Nasr.
Al-Zahrani also played for Saudi Arabia at the <a href="1999%20FIFA%20World%20Youth%20Championship">1999 FIFA World Youth Championship</a> in <a href="Nigeria">Nigeria</a>.
